title: Can someone recommend me some dating sim or weeb/VoHiYo games on STEAM?
body:
http://media.steampowered.com/steamcommunity/public/images/avatars/90/909ada430376ff89c62fc1a7e91dad7e5381b971_full.jpg

I'd like to play some of them but I have no idea where to start. 
Please recommend me your favorite one, is there one where you're a girl with all guys 
or are all of them that you're a guy and they're all girls? I want to feel loved by A.I

Thanks
{{champion:103}}
